title: Trump to discuss peace record at UN. What time is his speech? Watch live
shortDescription: President Donald Trump addresses the UN general assembly in person for the first time since 2019. Here’s info about his UN speech in New York City.

title: Rapper NBA YoungBoy Thanks Trump For Presidential Pardon
shortDescription: Louisiana rapper NBA YoungBoy, real name Kentrell D. Gaulden, was among those granted a presidential pardon by Donald Trump.

title: US allies look to Trump on Ukraine, Gaza war at the United Nations
shortDescription: President Trump will address the United Nations for the first time since returning to office and is likely to use the platform to take a victory lap.

title: 'Take this thing apart': with allies backing, Trump to punish foes
shortDescription: Trump's allies say after years of so-called "lawfare" the president is looking for legal action against longstanding opponents, dismaying critics.

title: Trump to meet with Schumer, Jeffries over looming shutdown
shortDescription: With just over a week until the government shuts down, Donald Trump is set to meet with the two top Democrats in Congress to negotiate funding.

title: Advocates call Trump, RFK's claims on autism and Tylenol 'dehumanizing'
shortDescription: The Trump administration claimed Monday that it had found the "answer to autism," drawing backlash from advocacy groups, experts and the community.

title: Autism and Tylenol: 5 takeaways from Trump and RFK Jr. announcement
shortDescription: The president and the health secretary said the painkiller increases the risk of autism, but the research is unclear and doctors are pushing back.

title: Trump urges pregnant women to avoid Tylenol citing unproved autism link
shortDescription: President Donald Trump cited unproven claims about a link between Tylenol use during pregnancy and autism in an announcement alongside officials in his administration.

title: Man accused of aiming laser pointer at Marine One with Trump on board
shortDescription: Jacob Samuel Winkler is accused by federal agents with aiming a laser pointer at Marine One with President Trump on board, according to an affidavit

title: Trump can't block Rhode Island offshore wind project, judge says
shortDescription: The ruling is a legal setback for Trump, who has sought to block expansion of offshore wind in US waters.

title: Trump warns women against Tylenol use in pregnancy
shortDescription: President Donald Trump cautioned pregnant women against Tylenol use. Tylenol parent company Kenvue says it is proven to be safe.

title: Former GOP rep confirmed as Trump nukes chief via 'nuclear' option
shortDescription: The former Syracuse-area congressman inherits several challenges in his new role atop the National Nuclear Security Administration.

title: Trump comments at odds with Hegseth on press access to Pentagon
shortDescription: Asked whether the Pentagon should be in charge of deciding what reporters can report on, Trump told reporters on Sept. 21, "No, I don’t think so."

title: Supreme Court to decide if Trump can fire independent board members
shortDescription: President Trump has tested his ability to remove leaders of agencies set up to be protected from arbitrary firings.

title: White House denies Tom Homan took $50,000 from undercover FBI agents
shortDescription: The White House denied border czar Tom Homan accepted $50,000 in cash bribes as alleged in a Justice Department investigation that was shut down.

title: What is leucovorin? Trump, RFK's potential answer to autism, explained
shortDescription: Trump administration officials are expected to discuss a medication called leucovorin as a potential treatment for autism.

title: Trump urges Bondi to prosecute his political opponents
shortDescription: U.S. President Donald Trump has urged Attorney General Pam Bondi to have the Justice Department pursue legal action against several of his political adversaries.

title: Watch livestream: Trump set to make announcement on autism research
shortDescription: The Trump administration is set to make an announcement about autism research on Monday afternoon, Sept. 22.

title: TikTok reaches deal to keep operating in US, White House says
shortDescription: TikTok has reached a preliminary deal to sell its U.S. operations to an American-based investor group, the White House said.

title: Pope Leo talks Trump, Vance, politics in new interview
shortDescription: The Catholic Church's first American pope, Pope Leo XIV, says in an in-depth interview that he hasn't met or spoken with President Trump − yet.

title: Trump blames Tylenol for autism, despite inconclusive evidence
shortDescription: Health experts say no single source is likely to blame for autism. And doctors say acetaminophen, the active ingredient in Tylenol, is safe to use.

title: Man accused in Trump assassination plot rests his case
shortDescription: Ryan Routh, the man accused of trying to kill President Donald Trump in Florida last year, rested his case on Sept. 22.

title: Trump, Musk reunite at Charlie Kirk’s funeral
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Elon Musk set aside differences to honor Charlie Kirk at his funeral in a rare public reunion.
